page.title: 10SELSEY REST HOMES PT.1
page.content: Many of the{larger houses}in Selsey are being{converted}into{Rest homes for the elderly.Some of our class visited one which was about 400 years old. They found out that it takes 11 residents aged between 74 and 94.Some of these are locals and some are from the London area.All of the residents are{permanent,}they have their{own {bedroom}and they can bring in their own furniture,television and personal possessions but no pets.They are mostly ladies.The owner tries to give the residents as much freedom as possible.They pay{Â£90}and upwards a week.None of the{staff}has to have qualifications.The owner is like your own Mum but she has to buy more food.
